Name: NOX TIMORE REMAKE
About the game: Official remake of the original Nox Timore, that was released in 2014. A nightmare, that you come back to every night. Mannequins. Darkness. Horror. It is a short horror experience of exploring the dark hallways that keep changing. More and more creatures stand in your way as you get deeper into the nightmare, from weird mannequins that always look at you to injured huge monstrosities that want to prevent you from continuing going down your path. Strange letters that speak to you can be found uncovering the secrets of this place and corridor walls that keep reorganizing themselves behind your back. Completely remade game from the original Nox Timore, the game has been recreated from zero with changes and additions, featuring voice acting and new creatures along with intense and creepy atmosphere.
